dares.title: The Key Master
dares.description: Solve this riddle to unlock the next challenge
dares.riddle: What has keys but no locks?

dares.title: The Silent Runner
dares.riddle: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?

dares.title: The Time Keeper
dares.riddle: What has hands but cannot clap?
dares.hint: You check it to know the time

dares.title: The Invisible Guardian
dares.riddle: I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost everyone. What am I?
dares.hint: Graphite comes from mines, and it's used for writing

dares.title: The Eternal Flame
dares.riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

dares.title: The Shadow Walker
dares.description: Prove your worth with this riddle
dares.riddle: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?

dares.title: The Memory Keeper
dares.riddle: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?

dares.title: The Crystal Seer
dares.riddle: What gets wetter as it dries?

dares.title: The Light Bearer
dares.riddle: What has to be broken before you can use it?

dares.title: The Code Breaker
dares.riddle: I am not alive, but I grow; I don't have lungs, but I need air; I don't have a mouth, but water kills me. What am I?
